title: Jacob’s Family Grows
summary: Genesis 30 continues the story of Jacob’s growing family. Rachel and Leah compete by giving their servants to Jacob. Eventually, Rachel bears Joseph. Jacob also becomes wealthy through selective breeding of Laban’s flocks.

faq.question: Why did Rachel give her servant to Jacob?
faq.answer: Because she was initially barren and wanted children through her servant.

faq.question: How did Jacob grow wealthy?
faq.answer: Through God’s guidance and a clever breeding strategy involving Laban’s flocks.
